mapper.insert: insert into ooi_interfacae_run_record_dtl ( interface_id, type_desc, run_step, file_name, file_num, file_success_num, error_desc, update_time, file_time ) values ( #{interfaceId}, #{typeDesc}, #{runStep}, #{fileName}, #{fileNum}, #{fileSuccessNum}, #{errorDesc}, now(), #{fileTime} );
mapper.select: SELECT max(file_time) from ooi_interfacae_run_record_dtl where interface_id = #{interfaceId} and type_desc = 0 and run_step = 2;
